briefTitle: A Study of Raltegravir in a Diverse Cohort of HIV-Infected Patients (0518-055)
officialTitle: A Phase III Open-Label Single Arm Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Efficacy of MK0518/Raltegravir in a Diverse Cohort of HIV-Infected Patients
summary: A study to test the safety and effect of twice daily raltegravir in a diverse cohort of patients currently infected with human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), where at least 50% are African American and at least 25% are female, either having received antiretroviral drugs before or not.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Who Achieved HIV Ribonucleic Acid (RNA) <50 Copies/mL at Week 48
